first_para: Damian Howard Green (born 17 January 1956) is a British politician who has been the Conservative Member of Parliament for Ashford since 1997. He came to national prominence in November 2008 after being arrested and having his parliamentary office raided by police. Before standing for Parliament, Green was Channel 4's business editor. He was the Minister of State for Police and Criminal Justice until 14 July 2014.

full.extract: Damian Howard Green (born 17 January 1956) is a British politician who has been the Conservative Member of Parliament for Ashford since 1997. He was the Minister of State for Police and Criminal Justice until 14 July 2014.
full.title: Damian Green
